DIA_Homeless02_HomelessHello_03_01: Good sir, will you help me?
DIA_Homeless02_HomelessGold_03_02: You are such a good man!
DIA_Homeless02_AmbientTalk_03_01: Too bad there aren't many people so generous.
DIA_Homeless02_INeedGold_03_02: Don't you have one gold piece on you?
DIA_Homeless02_SCARED_03_01: I'm sorry! I didn't mean to be pushy!
